summary: Ivan Marti is identified as the brother of Manuel Marti. FBI conducted local agency checks on Ivan Marti and his sister Blanca Marti in San Juan, Puerto Rico. Ivan Marti is mentioned in connection to Manuel Marti's background investigation. He is also noted as a subscriber to "New Horizons for Youth."
significance: Ivan Marti's significance in the JFK context appears to be related to his connection to Manuel Marti, who was under investigation. His subscription to "New Horizons for Youth" may have been of interest to the FBI during their investigation of Manuel Marti.
